translation.en: Jurassic One, Jurassic One, come in.
This is Isla Nublar Base, over.
translation.es: Somos la base Isla Nublar, cambio.

translation.en: - Go, Jurassic One. - Emergency. Hostiles in pursuit.
translation.es: - Adelante, Jurásico Uno. - Emergencia. Hostiles a la caza.

translation.en: Two friendlies in need of immediate extraction.
- Roger that, Base! On our way. -
We can't stop here. Follow me!
Wait. Wait. Wait, wait, wait.
Stop, stop, stop, stop.
I think we lost 'em.
- We gotta get to the chopper. -
Come on!
Raptor bones?
Hurry! We're almost to the extraction point!
No! We can use the river to mask our scent and--
translation.es: ¡No! Podemos ocultar nuestro olor en el río...

translation.en: - Aw, crud! -
Dang it!
Not cool, Brand.
Yeah, like you know what cool is.
translation.es: Como si supieras qué es eso.

translation.en: - - Get off me, Brand! - -
Aw, come on, man.
The dinos get you and that old dude every time.
translation.es: Siempre los atrapan a ti y a ese viejo.

translation.en: His name is Dr. Meriwether.
His name oughta be Dinner.
Brand, I'm so close.
If I can just get around the T. rex, I'd beat the game and win the--
translation.es: Si eludo al T. rex, ganaré y conseguiré el...

translation.en: Trip to Jurassic World.
I- I know. You've said it, like, a thousand times.
translation.es: Ya sé. Lo dijiste como mil veces.

translation.en: But if straight- up gamers say this thing's unwinnable,
translation.es: Si es imposible para los gamers,

translation.en: how's some dino- nerd kid gonna beat it?
translation.es: ¿cómo un niño dinonerd va a ganar?

translation.en: Great pep talk, bro. You been working on that?
Look, Darius, I know getting to Jurassic World
translation.es: Escucha, Darius, sé que ir a Mundo Jurásico

translation.en: was your and Dad's dream, but there's more to life than just dinosaurs.
translation.es: era tu sueño y el de papá, pero en la vida hay más que dinosaurios.

translation.en: You never leave your room anymore, bruh.
translation.es: Ya no sales de tu cuarto, hermano.

translation.en: Dad wouldn't want this.
I hear you, but even if winning is dumb and hopeless,
translation.es: Entiendo, pero incluso si ganar es tonto e imposible,

translation.en: I still gotta try, you know?
I guess so, D.
Can you at least, like, take a break? Maybe work in a shower?
- 'Cause you're smelling pretty funky, man. -
All right, look, you do you, D. Just do it quietly.
translation.es: De acuerdo, haz como quieras. Pero en silencio.

translation.en: I don't want Mom on my case again for you staying up...
translation.es: No quiero a mamá encima otra vez porque...

translation.en: That's it!
- - Ah, attack patterns? No.
Vocalizations, pack behavior? No.
Got it!
So, if my theory's correct...
translation.es: Entonces, si mi teoría es correcta...

translation.en: It's go time.
It's gotta be here somewhere.
Where are you? Where are you? Where are you?
There it is!
- - Please whistle.
Congratulations, player.
I'm Mr. DNA, and you're the first person to ever beat our game,
translation.es: Soy el señor ADN, y tú eres el primero que gana nuestro juego,

translation.en: so we wanna reward you with a trip
translation.es: por eso queremos premiarte con un viaje

translation.en: to Jurassic World's brand- new, state- of- the- art adventure camp.
translation.es: al nuevo y más avanzado campamento de aventura de Mundo Jurásico.

translation.en: That's right, get ready to join us at Camp Cretaceous!
translation.es: Así es, ¡prepárate para unirte a nosotros en Campamento Cretácico!

translation.en: Mom!
Welcome to Isla Nublar, campers.
You are the chosen few, the first kids in the entire world
translation.es: Ustedes son los pocos elegidos, los primeros niños de todo el mundo

translation.en: to ever experience the awesomeness
that is Camp Cretaceous.
I know, the trip from the mainland was rough on some.
translation.es: Para algunos fue difícil el viaje desde el continente.

translation.en: Hello, Ben.
But you made it!
I'm Dave, head counselor.
You heard that correctly-- head honcho, big shot.
Ah, so sorry I'm late. Welcome, campers!
I'm Roxie, head counselor of Camp Cretaceous.
translation.es: Soy Roxie, supervisora jefa de Campamento Cretácico.

translation.en: Well, it's sort of a co- head counselor sort of situation.
translation.es: Somos algo así como supervisores jefes conjuntos.

translation.en: - Is it? -
Anyway, some of you won contests to be here,
some of you had VIP invites, but for the next two weeks,
translation.es: otros tenían invitaciones vip, pero durante dos semanas,

translation.en: all of you will be getting the five- star treatment!
As our first campers, we've lined up
exclusive behind- the- scenes tours of Jurassic World.
translation.es: paseos exclusivos tras las bambalinas de Mundo Jurásico.

translation.en: - Ooh! - Yes!
As well as kayaking, rock climbing, obstacle courses, and of course...
translation.es: Así como kayak, alpinismo, carreras de obstáculos y, por supuesto...

translation.en: Dinosaurs?
Yes... Darius, plenty of dinosaurs.
So, ready for an adventure?
Absolutely!
But I'm gonna need that speech a little shorter,
and really try to lean into the majesty of this place.
translation.es: y sumergirte en la majestuosidad del lugar.

translation.en: Okay, we're going now.
Let's get the six of you to camp.
Uh, there are five of us.
Wait.
Dino- kid, Track- Star, Internet Girl, Barfy, Texas.
He's right. Where's Six?
Greetings, my dudes. Kenji is here, so let the party commence!
translation.es: Saludos, amigos. Kenji está aquí. ¡Qué comience la fiesta!

translation.en: - - Put this in my room.
So, what's your deal?
Okay, let's go.
I hope you got my mom's note.
I don't do well on windy roads.
translation.es: Me hacen mal las carreteras sinuosas.

translation.en: What's good, Brooklanders?
It's your girl Brooklynn coming at you from the best place ever:
translation.es: Aquí Brooklynn transmitiendo desde el mejor lugar:

translation.en: Camp Cretaceous.
Like and subscribe to join me as I unbox Jurassic World!
translation.es: ¡Dame un me gusta y suscríbete para ver cómo descubro Mundo Jurásico!

translation.en: Okay, I need you all to say who you are and a little bit about yourself.
translation.es: Deben contar quiénes son y algo de ustedes.

translation.en: And, action!
I beat this awesome VR dinosaur game.
translation.es: Gané un juego de dinosaurios de realidad virtual.

translation.en: - I'm Darius, by the-- - I'm sorry.
I just can't believe... you're Brooklynn!
I'm Sammy Gutierrez, total Brooklander!
Oh, also, my family supplies all the beef for the park, and that's how I got here.
translation.es: Mi familia provee carne al parque, así llegué aquí.

translation.en: Great to meet you, Sammy.
Um... What's a Brooklander?
Oh, that's just what my online followers call themselves.
translation.es: Así es como se llaman a sí mismos mis seguidores.

translation.en: Uh, all 27 million of us.
Yep. That's why she's the only one who gets to keep her cell phone.
translation.es: Sí. Por eso ella es la única que puede tener su teléfono celular.

translation.en: She's famous.
Hold on. Rich and famous?
Oh, meant to be.
- - Um, Dave, what's going on?
- Nothing you need to worry about. -
translation.es: Nada de lo que debas preocuparte.

translation.en: But you should all definitely stay in your seats.
Guys?
Guys?
Crisis averted.
Oh, these things are always getting out of their enclosure.
translation.es: Estas cosas siempre salen de su cercado.

translation.en: A real live Compsognathus!
Oh, please.
It took a blanket and a cat carrier to catch it.
translation.es: Lo atraparon con una manta y una jaula para gatos.

translation.en: Boring.
- Scared you pretty good. -
Wow.
Welcome to Camp Cretaceous.
Oh, my gosh!
- Whoo- hoo! - Yeah!
Hey, Brooklanders, check this place out!
Is this not the most amazing place you have ever seen?
translation.es: ¿No es el lugar más maravilloso que jamás hayan visto?

translation.en: If you think this is cool, you should see my dad's penthouse in the main park.
translation.es: Si esto te parece genial, deberías ver el penthouse de mi papá.

translation.en: Yasmina!
Hey, girl.
So, as an elite athlete, how pumped are you for camp?
translation.es: Como una atleta de élite, ¿cuán emocionada estás por acampar?

translation.en: Not a huge fan of being on camera.
translation.es: No me gusta salir en cámara.

translation.en: Or people.
This place is almost as big as my family's ranch back home.
translation.es: Este lugar es casi tan grande como la hacienda de mi familia.

translation.en: That's because when we're up and running,
the camp will house 500 kids and 150 staff.
translation.es: el campamento hospedará a 500 niños y 150 empleados.

translation.en: Listen up!
Announcement time from your co- head counselors.
translation.es: Anuncios de sus supervisores jefes conjuntos.

translation.en: Psst, still not a thing.
Okay, everyone, there's some ground rules to cover.
Curfew's at 8:00 p.m., and lights out at 9:00 p.m. sharp.
translation.es: El horario límite es a las 8 p. m. y las luces se apagan a las 9 p. m.

translation.en: - What? - Lame.
Fine.
This is for your safety.
We are in a dinosaur- filled jungle.
translation.es: Estamos en una selva llena de dinosaurios.

translation.en: You must always keep your distance,
or you could be seriously hurt, if not worse.
translation.es: o podrían lastimarse gravemente o algo peor.

translation.en: Define worse.
Cabins are up that- a- way.
- First one there gets top bunk! -
translation.es: ¡La primera toma la cama de arriba!

translation.en: - - Get this lovely lady back to her pen.
translation.es: Lleva esta señorita a su jaula.

translation.en: Her family's probably worried sick.
translation.es: Seguro su familia está muy preocupada.

translation.en: - - W- Wait!
Oh, man, I really wanted to get a closer look at that Compy.
translation.es: Maldición. Tenía muchas ganas de ver de cerca a esa Compi.

translation.en: I like your enthusiasm, Darius, but right now it's claiming a bunk time.
translation.es: Me gusta tu entusiasmo, Darius, pero es momento de buscar cama.

translation.en: So, you know... go claim a bunk.
translation.es: Así que... ve a buscar una cama.

translation.en: But it's the first dinosaur I've ever seen in person
translation.es: Es el primer dinosaurio que veo,

translation.en: and, I mean, we're here to see dinosaurs, so...
translation.es: y estamos aquí para ver dinosaurios, entonces...

translation.en: Oh, the day is not over, buddy.
- Wow! -
Dinosaurs!
There's Brachiosaurus.
Ankylosaurus!
Wow, you really do know your stuff, dino- nerd.
translation.es: Vaya, realmente sabes de lo tuyo, Dinonerd.

translation.en: Check out the... Brontosaurus.
They don't have those here. Common mistake.
translation.es: No hay de esos. Error común.

translation.en: Are those Sinoceratops?
When did you get those?
They are cooking up all kinds of new dinos in that lab.
translation.es: Están creando muchos dinosaurios nuevos aquí.

translation.en: Whoa! Where are they herding 'em to?
They're herding them back to their nighttime enclosures.
translation.es: Los llevan a sus cercados nocturnos.

translation.en: Enough banter.
It's zip- line party time!
translation.es: ¡Es hora de la fiesta de tirolesa!

translation.en: Me? Maybe Yasmina should go first, or... Darius?
translation.es: ¿Yo? Quizá Yasmina debería ir primero, o Darius...

translation.en: Uh... Or anyone! I really don't--
Wow!
- Yeah! -
Oh, hey there, dino- nerd. Whatcha doing?
Huh? Uh, nothing!
I was just, uh, heading out 'cause...
thirsty.
Oh, yeah. I... I meant, um... hungry.
translation.es: Sí. Quise decir que tenía hambre.

translation.en: Oh, heh, look at that. Thanks, Kenji.
Look, bro.
I don't want you to be intimidated by me just because I'm rich,
translation.es: No quiero intimidarte solo porque soy rico,

translation.en: my father owns a few condos on the island, and I'm rich.
translation.es: mi padre tiene algunos condominios en la isla, y soy rico.

translation.en: - Uh, I'm not intimidated by you. - Oh, good.
I just want us to be friends, and friends tell each other stuff.
translation.es: Quiero ser tu amigo. Los amigos se cuentan cosas.

translation.en: For instance, what they're doing out of bed after curfew.
translation.es: Por ejemplo, qué hacen fuera de la cama luego de la hora límite.

translation.en: What do you think?
I think you best get your arm off me... friend.
translation.es: Que será mejor que me quites el brazo de encima, amigo.

translation.en: Oh. Why don't you make me, friend?
So that's what toxic masculinity looks like.
translation.es: Entonces así luce la masculinidad tóxica.

translation.en: Uh, sorry we woke you. I--
He was sneaking out, but I set him straight.
translation.es: Estaba escapándose, pero lo puse en su lugar.

translation.en: Look, I try to look out for the younger kids.
translation.es: Trato de cuidar a los niños.

translation.en: It's who I am.
You guys don't understand.
I've been waiting my whole life to get here,
translation.es: Esperé toda la vida para venir aquí,

translation.en: and I'm gonna make the most of it.
translation.es: y voy a aprovecharlo al máximo.

translation.en: Those lights must be coming from the Compy enclosure.
translation.es: Esas luces deben ser del cercado del Compi.

translation.en: I gotta check it out!
Sneaking out to see dinosaurs in the dead of night,
translation.es: Escapar a ver dinosaurios a medianoche,

translation.en: mad danger of getting caught,
great mood lighting...
I guess that means...
we're going rogue.
I think this is it.
The truck definitely headed this direction.
translation.es: Sin duda, el camión vino hacia acá.

translation.en: Of course this is it. Why else would they have--
translation.es: Por supuesto que es aquí. ¿Por qué más...?

translation.en: Hey, Brooklynn.
You can get a good shot from over here.
translation.es: puedes sacar una buena foto aquí.

translation.en: - Allow me. - No, thanks. I can--
- Just--  - Hey!
Give me my-- Ugh!
Come on!
Thanks, Kenji. Real smooth.
Relax, I'll get it.
- Wait! What are you-- - I got it, kid.
See? Ha! Good as new.
Great. Now, just climb back up and gently hand it to me.
translation.es: Genial. Ahora solo trepa de vuelta y entrégamelo cuidadosamente.

translation.en: Sure, sure, right after I get a sweet dino- pic for your followers.
translation.es: Claro, después de sacar una buena foto a un dinosaurio para tus seguidores.

translation.en: No need to thank me.
Um, guys...
this isn't the Compy pen.
translation.es: No es la jaula del Compi.

translation.en: Quiet, junior! The grown- ups are talking.
Ah, your followers are gonna love this.
translation.es: A tus seguidores les encantará esto.

translation.en: Here, Compy- Compy- Compy.
This isn't the Compy pen!
- Uh, what's he babbling on about? -
What the...?
Come on!
D'ah! Open the gate! Open the gate!
- - Oh, please! Let me out!
Oh, come on!
Dude! Please tell me you have a plan.
translation.es: ¡Amigo! Por favor, dime que tienes un plan.

translation.en: Let's move! The steam should keep him busy.
Oh, crud!
